title: SKT Worlds skins
body: It was said on the rift rivals that the skins will be available on the 5th, world Wide. Its now about 3:30 on the arvo of the 5th, and still no skins. Im getting impatient man.....

replies.body: Yeah I have the RP in Cards for the same 2 skins, I mean Fish is like "Available for 1350 RP on the 5th of July World wide" To me that sounds like they will be released as each time zone gets to the 5th.

It's going to likely be released during the evening of EUW's time... On their July 5th -.- I think Riot should have released them much earlier, personally. Saves the confusion. So Apparently in a few hours. If they don't by 9 am AEST today I'm going to be a little bit more than disappointed since that's midnight in the UK. Legit saving 4K RP just so I can get Jhin and Syndra for me and Nami for my friend. -.-

Then why say on the OCE Broadcast they would be available on the 5th when its not true, I know its nitpicky but its just annoying that it gets my hopes up when I work like 70 hour weeks and I come home with RP cards and still nothing

Remember that NA is behind us timezone wise. Even now it is only 4am EST which I believe is what the Riot offices run on. So yes it is Wednesday for us, but when you posted it was barely Wednesday for them. Likely they'll be up in a few hours.
